title: The #1 Thing That Ruins Relationships w/ Sam & Monica
itunes:author: Joey Kidney
itunes:subtitle: Welcome back to the Happy Times podcast! In today…
itunes:summary:
Welcome back to the Happy Times podcast! In todays episode we welcome our guests Sam Patterson & Monica Gartner, who are a Long Distance Relationship couple. We go over how they met and some pointers on how to maintain your relationship. 

I hope you enjoy!
